dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We only collect essential data required for account management and file storage synchronization. This includes your username, encrypted credentials, and access logs for security auditing.

storageSecurity.title: Storage Security
storageSecurity.content: Your files are stored in your selected backend nodes (S3, Local, etc.) with strict access control. We never inspect the contents of your files unless explicitly requested for technical support.

cookieUsage.title: Cookie Usage
cookieUsage.content: We use local persistent storage (StorageHub: LocalStorage + IndexedDB) to remember theme preferences, language settings, and active session tokens.

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.content: You agree to use FileUni only for lawful purposes. You are responsible for all activities occurring under your account.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend accounts found to be in violation of system integrity or engaged in malicious scraping.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.content: FileUni is provided "as is". While we aim for 99.9% uptime, we recommend maintaining external backups for critical data.

filemanager.name: Name

shareModal.title: Share Content
shareModal.enableDirectDesc: Allow bypassing the preview page to access content directly
shareModal.successDesc: Your share is ready. Please save the details below.
shareModal.directLinkDesc: Bypass preview page to access the raw file stream directly.
shareModal.passwordChangeWarning: Warning: Changing the password will immediately invalidate the old one. This action is irreversible.
shareModal.qrDesc: Scan to get full share info

officeLite.name: Office Lite
officeLite.openHint: Choose a method to open this document.
officeLite.externalViewerHint: External viewers require the file URL to be publicly reachable.
officeLite.largeFileWarning: This file is larger than {{size}} MB. Preview and editing may be slow.
officeLite.complexHint: Complex document detected. Office Lite may lose formatting. Office Online is recommended.
officeLite.docxHint: Text-only editing. Layout, tables, images, headers, and footers are preserved but formatting may change.
officeLite.cdnUrlHint: Default uses jsDelivr and PPTXjs master branch.

archive.batchNameHint: Batch compression output name is generated by the server.
archive.targetPathHint: Choose the destination directory path. It must start with '/'.
archive.overwriteHint: When disabled, existing files will be kept.
archive.deleteArchiveHint: Delete the archive file after successful extraction.
archive.deleteSourceHint: Delete the source files after successful compression.
archive.taskIdMissing: Task id is missing in response

thumbnail.settingsDesc: Enable or disable thumbnails by file type.
thumbnail.confirmClearAllUsers: Clear thumbnail cache for all users?

preview.notSupported: The system does not support viewing this file type online.

editor.cdnSaved: CDN Configuration saved. Please refresh to apply.

messages.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete these {{count}} items?
messages.confirmClearHistory: Are you sure you want to clear browsing history?
messages.confirmClearTrash: Are you sure you want to empty the trash?
messages.confirmClearTargetHistory: Are you sure you want to permanently clear all local chat history with this contact?
messages.uploadInstruction: Support multiple files and original directory structure.
messages.uploadTip1: Folders will be uploaded recursively, rebuilding the hierarchy on the server.
messages.uploadTip2: Files with duplicate names will be automatically renamed to prevent overwriting.

help.title: User Guide
help.subtitle: Shortcuts & Interactions
help.tip: Tips: You can also use Drag & Drop to upload or move files.

selection.title: Selection & Navigation
selection.selectAll: Select all items in current folder
selection.escape: Clear selection or close current view

mouse.title: Mouse & Gestures
mouse.dragDrop: Move files or folders between directories

filemanager.clearHistoryDesc: History covers: directory browsing, property checks, previews, and downloads.

auth.manageAccountsDesc: Here you can manage all logged-in accounts, switch workspaces, or remove login information no longer needed.
auth.manageAccountsDescShort: Select or switch between logged-in accounts
auth.logoutAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to log out of all accounts?
auth.removeAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this account locally? You will need to log in again to access it.
auth.agreementPrefix: I have read and agree to the
auth.deleteConfirmPhrase: I know I am deleting my account
auth.registrationDisabledDesc: User registration is currently disabled by system administrator.
auth.captchaRequired: For security, please enter the captcha
auth.deviceLimitDesc: Your account is active on {{count}} devices (Max: {{max}}). Please select and revoke one or more sessions to continue.
auth.defaultPasswordDesc: For your security, it is highly recommended to change the default 'admin888' password.

admin_fs.global_ops_desc: Caution: These actions affect the entire cluster and should only be performed during maintenance windows.
admin_fs.emergency_desc: Caution: These actions bypass normal VFS safety checks and may lead to data inconsistency.

publicShare.linkExpired: This share link has expired or reached its download limit.
publicShare.passwordRequiredDesc: This content requires a password to unlock.
publicShare.qrScanDesc: Scan to open this share on your phone

cacheManager.title: Cache Manager
cacheManager.subtitle: Inspect and clear frontend caches in one place. Default actions only affect the current account.
cacheManager.warningText: Cache cleanup only affects local data on this device and does not change server data.

chat_cache.title: Chat Cache
chat_cache.desc: Chat history, nicknames, and session settings

file_manager_cache.title: File Manager Cache
file_manager_cache.desc: Paths, tabs, clipboard, tasks, and local state

user_session_cache.title: User Session Cache
user_session_cache.desc: Local account map and session tokens

extension_cache.title: Extension Panel Cache
extension_cache.desc: Local override settings for extension management

ui_preferences_cache.title: UI Preferences Cache
ui_preferences_cache.desc: Theme, language, and global UI preferences

profile.verifiedNote: These verified credentials can only be modified in the Security Center.
profile.phoneListSynced: Extra phone numbers were synced to server format
profile.invalidPhoneFormat: Invalid phone number format. Examples: China Mainland +8613812345678, US +12025550123, Japan +819012345678
profile.invalidPhoneList: There are invalid phone numbers. Please fix them before saving

security.emailDesc: Used for password recovery and alerts.
security.s3Desc: Use these keys to access your files via S3 protocol.
security.rotateConfirm: Regenerate S3 keys? Old keys will become invalid immediately!
security.deleteNote: Once initiated, all your files, metadata, and active sessions will be purged. This action is irreversible.
security.invalidPhoneFormat: Invalid phone number format. Examples: China Mainland +8613812345678, US +12025550123, Japan +819012345678
security.targetNormalized: Contact value was normalized to server format

sessions.revokeConfirm: Are you sure you want to terminate this session?
sessions.adviceDesc: If you see a device you don't recognize, we recommend revoking its access immediately and changing your password.

backup.title: System Backup
backup.exportDesc: Download a full system backup including database records (Users, Roles, Logs) and configuration files. File indexes are excluded by default to reduce size.
backup.importDesc: Restore system from a previously exported .tar.gz file.
backup.importWarning: Warning: Existing data will be overwritten!
backup.confirmMsg: WARNING: This will overwrite current database data and configuration files. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure?
backup.importSuccess: System restored successfully. Please restart the server if configuration changed.
backup.localDesc: Save a full backup directly to the server's local disk. Recommended for large databases or routine maintenance.
backup.largeDbWarning: Important: If any database table exceeds 100,000 records or the backup size is huge, please use professional tools (like pg_dump or sqlite3 backup) to ensure stability.

tasks.title: Task Monitor
tasks.cancel_confirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this task?

extensions.title: Extension Manager
extensions.githubBaseHint: Use config extension_manager.github_base_url to route GitHub downloads in restricted networks.
extensions.catalogLoadFailed: Failed to load extension catalog, please check /assets/extension-catalog.json
extensions.downloadUrlMissing: Download URL is empty, set version or custom URL

openlist.title: OpenList Management
openlist.followStartHint: Enable follow-start in System Settings; this page is display-only
openlist.binPathHint: Executable path: downloaded binary target path
openlist.templateHint: GitHub download template: generate final download URL
openlist.proxyHint: GitHub proxy base URL: use when github.com is unreachable
openlist.customUrlHint: Custom download URL: overrides template when set
openlist.dataPathHint: Data path: used for OpenList state and reset action

domain.title: Domain Automation
domain.providerCredentialPlaceholder: credential json (will be encrypted at rest)
domain.providerCredentialEditPlaceholder: credential json (blank = keep existing encrypted value)
domain.acmeAutoRenewHint: Auto renewal rule: scheduler check (default daily) and manual check both renew certificates whose remaining days are less than configured threshold. Force update ignores remaining days.
domain.ddnsRequired: DDNS name, provider account and fqdn are required
domain.certNameEmailRequired: Certificate name and email are required
domain.certHttp01WebrootRequired: HTTP-01 requires dns config json with webroot/http_webroot
domain.certDnsConfigInvalid: dns config json must be valid json object
domain.certDownloadedWithKey: Certificate downloaded (private key stored on server)

ddns.title: DDNS
ddns.subtitle: Configure provider, IPv4/IPv6 records, source detection and webhook
ddns.ipv4UrlPlaceholder: IPv4 detect URLs separated by comma
ddns.ipv6UrlPlaceholder: IPv6 detect URLs separated by comma
ddns.domainsPlaceholder: One domain each line, support sub:zone format
ddns.webhookHeadersPlaceholder: One header per line, format: Key: Value
ddns.allowPrivateTargetHint: Enable to allow Webhook/Callback to localhost or private IPs
ddns.ipv6RegexNoInterface: No IPv6 address on selected interface
ddns.saveConfirmMsg: Saving will replace records in current config group. Continue?

acme.title: ACME Certificate Management
acme.subtitle: Automated issue and renewal for Let’s Encrypt / ZeroSSL certificates

form.name: Certificate Name
form.providerNotFound: DNS provider metadata not found, manual configuration is still supported
form.providerTemplateMissing: No template available for this DNS provider
form.zerosslEabHint: Leave empty to auto-fetch EAB credentials with account email
form.syncHint: Form fields and JSON are synchronized. Save uses JSON as final source.
form.rawJsonWarning: Edit JSON carefully. Invalid fields may cause issuance failure.

validation.domainsRequired: At least one domain or IP is required
validation.mixedWildcardIpNotSupported: A single certificate cannot mix wildcard domains and IP identifiers
validation.httpWildcardNotSupported: HTTP-01 does not support wildcard domains, use dns01/auto
validation.dnsIpNotSupported: DNS-01 does not support IP identifiers, use http01/auto
validation.providerIdRequired: Current DNS provider requires Provider ID
validation.providerSecretRequired: Current DNS provider requires Provider Secret

web.title: Website Management
web.subtitle: Single site supports multiple domains, IPs and ports

form.proxyTlsInsecureHint: Only available when upstream starts with https://
form.tlsAcmeCertNone: Do not use ACME certificate (manual paths)
form.proxyHeadersHint: Additional HTTP headers sent to upstream, must be a JSON object

validation.bindingsRequired: At least one binding rule is required
validation.listenIpsRequired: At least one listen IP is required
validation.listenPortsRequired: At least one listen port is required
validation.hostnamesRequired: At least one hostname is required
validation.tlsFilesRequired: TLS cert and key paths are required when TLS is enabled
validation.staticRootRequired: Static root is required for static mode
validation.proxyUpstreamRequired: Proxy upstream is required for proxy mode

warnings.title: Conflict Warning
warnings.duplicateHostInSite: Duplicated hostname binding in current site: {{key}} -> {{host}}
warnings.multiDefaultInListener: Multiple default bindings in the same listener group: {{key}}
warnings.defaultConflict: Default binding conflict with another site: {{site}} ({{key}})
warnings.hostnameConflict: Hostname binding conflict with another site: {{site}} ({{key}})

diagnostics.title: Listener Diagnostics
diagnostics.desc: Nginx-like matching first selects listener endpoint, then matches Host. This panel shows current and cross-site conflicts by listener group.

users.title: User Management
users.resetPwdConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset password for {{username}}?
users.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete user {{username}}?
users.deleteWarning: Warning: The user will be soft-deleted. All data remains but login will be disabled. You can restore the user later.
users.deleteAdminWarning: Warning: You are attempting to delete a System Administrator. This may lead to loss of management access or system risks.

fs.global_ops_desc: Caution: These actions affect the entire cluster and should only be performed during maintenance windows.
fs.emergency_desc: Caution: These actions bypass normal VFS safety checks and may lead to data inconsistency.
fs.unlock_confirm: Are you sure you want to perform a force unlock? This may interrupt ongoing maintenance tasks!

settings.title: System Settings
settings.noData: No data available for this section
settings.navNote: Modifying system parameters will take effect immediately for the runtime config, but some core engines may require a restart.
settings.licenseNote: License keys are bound to the specific hardware fingerprint of this server. Changing significant hardware components may require a new license key.
settings.generalNote: Changes to core engine parameters may require a system restart to take full effect. Always validate your TOML structure before making direct edits.

config.title: Configuration Editor
config.resetNotice: Template loaded. Review and save to apply changes.
config.resetHint: Reset replaces editor content with the embedded template. Modify and save before reload.
config.noteEmpty: No note available for the current key.
config.noteHint: Notes map to config keys and sections.

quickWizard.title: Quick Config Wizard
quickWizard.subtitle: Friendly form stays synchronized with the page-level config editor.
quickWizard.parseErrorTitle: Current TOML cannot be parsed in friendly mode.
quickWizard.parseErrorHint: Please fix TOML in the page-level config editor, then reopen this wizard.

fields.licenseInputPlaceholder: Paste your Base64 license key here...
fields.licenseHint: Get your license key from the official website. The device code is used for hardware binding.

advancedActions.intro: Advanced settings are managed in the admin config workspace. Use these quick actions.
advancedActions.licensePlaceholderHint: License management entry is reserved for future implementation.

performance.intro: Select recommended settings based on your hardware. These are suggestions - you can manually adjust all parameters in subsequent steps.

preview.simpleHint: This section shows key outcomes. Expand details to inspect each exact config key.

descriptions.extremeLow: For legacy routers, embedded devices with extremely limited hardware resources. Core features and WebDAV only.
descriptions.low: For low-end devices, small IoT gateways with limited hardware resources. Basic file management and WebDAV.
descriptions.medium: For home servers, NAS devices with moderate hardware resources. SQLite + Database cache recommended.
descriptions.good: For servers, high-performance NAS with ample hardware resources. Choose load profile for further optimization.

loadProfile.title: Load Profile Selection
loadProfile.desc: Choose a load profile based on expected usage. Heavy load mode suggests disabling non-core features for stability.
loadProfile.lightDesc: More features enabled, suitable for personal or small team use
loadProfile.heavyDesc: Non-core features suggested to be disabled, suitable for high concurrency scenarios

preheatMode.title: Captcha Preheat Strategy
preheatMode.desc: Balances captcha pool memory usage and burst-time generation throughput. This strategy automatically tunes pool and concurrency values.

descs.memory: Reduce preheat pool and concurrency for lower memory usage
descs.balanced: Balance memory usage and response speed
descs.throughput: Increase pool and concurrency to absorb traffic bursts

performanceTips.title: Performance Optimization Tips
performanceTips.raid: Consider RAID arrays for improved disk I/O performance and data redundancy
performanceTips.pgsql: Tune PostgreSQL parameters (shared_buffers, work_mem, effective_cache_size) to match hardware resources
performanceTips.memory: This module provides basic optimization suggestions; complex scenarios require system-level tuning

edit.sftpPassDesc: Allow login to SFTP using password

configGuard.featureDisabledDesc: This feature has been disabled by the administrator. Please contact your system administrator for more information.

errors.INTERNAL_ERROR: Internal server error, please try again later
errors.MULTIPART_PARSE_FAILED: Failed to parse multipart upload data
errors.USER_CONTEXT_MISSING: User context is missing, please sign in again
errors.TOO_MANY_ATTEMPTS: Too many failed attempts, please try again later
errors.SECURITY_QUESTION_REQUIRED: Security question and answer cannot be empty
errors.ACCOUNT_DISABLED: Account has been disabled, please contact administrator
errors.VERIFICATION_CODE_ERROR: Verification code send or verify failed
errors.LICENSE_LIMIT_REACHED: System license quota reached or expired. Please contact administrator.
errors.INVALID_LICENSE_KEY: Invalid license key or hardware mismatch.
errors.CHAT_NOT_GROUP_MEMBER: You are not a member of this chat group
errors.CHAT_RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Too many chat requests, please try again later
errors.DIRECTORY_OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED: Operation requires directory context or directory state mismatch
errors.SHARE_EXPIRED: Share expired or download limit reached
errors.THUMBNAIL_NOT_SUPPORTED: Thumbnail is not supported for this file

wizard.title: FileUni Initialization
wizard.subtitle: Configure your high-performance file management system

locked.title: Setup Mode Locked
locked.howToUnlockFile: To unlock, create this flag file in the project root:
locked.howToUnlockArg: Or restart the service with this argument:

profile.title: Select Performance Profile
profile.subtitle: Choose a starting point based on your hardware. You can customize everything in the next step.

low.name: Eco / IoT
low.desc: Perfect for Raspberry Pi or 1GB VPS. Lightweight SQLite & In-memory cache.

medium.name: Standard
medium.desc: Balanced setting for Home NAS. Reliable and efficient metadata handling.

high.name: Performance
high.desc: Production grade. Best with PostgreSQL & Redis for massive file clusters.

config.title: Environment Setup
config.subtitle: Configure your database and cache. DSN strings will be built automatically.
config.dsnNote: Note: Manual edits to the DSN will override form values.
config.kvDashmapHint: Note: In-memory cache is volatile and cleared on restart.
config.kvSqlHint: Note: Will reuse primary database for cache storage.

admin.title: Create Super Admin
admin.subtitle: This account will have full control over the system.
admin.finalConfirmDesc: Clicking will save the system configuration and ensure the admin account is ready. If tables or the administrator already exist, the system will only perform necessary synchronization.

final.title: Everything is ready!
final.subtitle: Administrator {{user}} has been granted full access.
final.step1: Sign in with your administrator account.
final.step2: Edit and save configuration online in the Admin Console.
final.step3: Or open the local config file and modify it directly.

logs.title: Real-time Deployment Log
logs.applyingConfig: Applying configuration and syncing DB schema...
logs.setupSuccess: Setup completed successfully! Please follow the instructions to restart.

chat.title: Chat
chat.noPersistenceWarning: Note: This system does not store any chat history. Messages are only forwarded via real-time channels when both parties are online. To keep history, ensure your browser cache is not cleared.
chat.addMembersDesc: Add new members to the group
chat.groupEncryptionKeyPlaceholder: Leave empty to use default key
chat.saveHistoryDesc: Save chat history to local browser storage
chat.enableWebRTCDesc: Use P2P direct connection whenever possible for speed and privacy
chat.terminalActive: Communication terminal active, waiting for commands...
chat.encryptionKeyPlaceholder: Custom key used for encrypting messages
chat.defaultNicknameDesc: This nickname will be used when guests join via this invite
chat.inviteCreatedAndCopied: Invite created and link copied to clipboard
chat.confirmDeleteInvite: Are you sure you want to delete this invite? Associated guests won't be able to log in.
chat.selectRoom: Select a room to start chatting
chat.searchUserPlaceholder: Search by ID, nickname, or username...
chat.callFailed: Failed to start call, please check microphone permissions
chat.encryptionKeyNote: Both parties must use the same key to decrypt messages (Each conversation can have an independent key)
chat.encryptionHint: This key is used to encrypt your messages locally. It is NEVER sent to the server
chat.mic_access_failed: Failed to access microphone. Please check permissions.
chat.enterSessionKeyPrompt: Enter private session key for this conversation (not saved):
chat.system_crashed: Chat system crashed, please refresh the page
chat.webrtc_failed: P2P connection with {{name}} failed. Falling back to server relay.
chat.rate_limit_exceeded: Rate limit exceeded. Please wait a moment.
chat.guestNote: Guest mode is for temporary chat only. Do not send sensitive information in this mode.
chat.selectToStart: Select a conversation from the left to start
chat.typeMessage: Type your message, press Enter to send...
chat.offline: Offline - messages will be sent when connected
chat.confirmClearTargetHistory: Are you sure you want to clear all local chat history with this contact?
chat.p2pRequiredToast: This feature requires a P2P connection
chat.p2pHelpContent: When both users are online, the system automatically establishes a secure peer-to-peer encrypted connection.
chat.p2pHelpDetail1: • P2P connection is more secure, messages transmit directly between devices
chat.p2pHelpDetail2: • Faster transmission speed and lower latency
chat.p2pHelpDetail3: • P2P supported features: Voice/Video calls, File transfer
chat.p2pHelpDetail4: • When the recipient is offline, messages are queued and delivered when they come online
chat.largeFileTip: Tip: For large files, using the system's 'File Manager' share feature is recommended for a better experience.
chat.micAccessFailed: Failed to access microphone. Please check permissions.
chat.media_access_failed: Failed to access media devices. Please check permissions.

email.title: Email
email.subtitle: Multi-Account Email Management
email.confirmDeleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete this email account?
email.exportPasswordPrompt: Set an export encryption password (min 8 chars):
email.importDataPrompt: Paste the exported encrypted data content:
email.importPasswordPrompt: Enter the encryption password for this data:
email.selectFolder: Select a folder to view messages
email.selectMessage: Select an email to view details
email.subject: Subject
email.saveToVfsFailed: Failed to save to My Files
email.sendSuccessModalDescription: The email has been sent successfully via {{address}}.
email.securityShieldBlocked: Security Shield: HTML rendering is blocked for your privacy.
email.securityShieldActive: Caution: Advanced HTML rendering is active.
email.exportDescription: Export all email account configurations as an encrypted backup file with password protection.
email.importRequired: Please enter import password and data

launcher.title: FileUni Launcher
launcher.subtitle: High Performance File Core
launcher.system_integration_desc: Setup as a system background service
launcher.nixos_desc: On NixOS, it is recommended to manage the service via your Nix configuration.

messages.password_too_short: Password must be at least 6 characters

launcher.reset_admin_password_desc: This will reset the admin password. Please enter the new password:

config_selector.subtitle: First use requires specifying a configuration file
config_selector.path_placeholder: Enter or select configuration file path...
config_selector.no_config_warning: No configuration file detected. Please select an existing configuration file or create a new example configuration file.
config_selector.file_not_exist: Configuration file does not exist. Please create a config file or select an existing one.
